"We are a group of people who believes wheels are the wings to humans, gifted by God"

Carry Own Bottle

#carryownbottle


Carry Own Bottle is a small initiative to spread awareness among people to reduce the usage of disposable bottles during travel.
“Here we are making a pledge on the consumption of plastic that we will carry our own water bottle while travelling instead of buying bottled water”

A Rain ride to Vembly Waterfalls

When you are at an awesome fall and no one else is there other than you, what will you call that feeling? We felt like it was our own fall and we enjoyed to the maximum.
Vembly Waterfalls or Vembili waterfalls is a beautiful waterfall situated at Urumbikkara near Mundakkayam, Kerala. It is around 11 km from Mundakkayam town in the Mundakayam - Urumbikara route, 25 km from Erattupetta, 37 km from Vagamon and 100 km from Kochi.
